alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Herkimer County through 330 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richfield Springs, or 9 miles south of Ilion, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jordanville, Warren, Crains Corners, Cullen, Dennison Corners, McCoon Crossing, Starkville, South Columbia, Schuyler Corners, Van Hornesville, Willse Four Corners, Kingdom, Getman Corners, Columbia Center and Orendorf Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern New York.
